document.full_text: matthew nestor was sentenced to 13 months in prison for obstructing the investigation into the beating death of a mexican immigrant in shenandoah, pa., in 2008.
document.title: former police chief is sentenced for cover-up in mexican's death
lines_and_colors: matthew nestor was sentenced to 13 months in prison for obstructing the investigation into the beating death of a mexican immigrant in shenandoah, pa., in 2008.
